content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No structures have been created on the map yet. The agent has only performed crafting activities.

ERROR TIPS
### Errors when trying to place entities without having them in inventory
- Check if required entity exists in inventory before attempting to place it
- Craft required entities first if they are not available in inventory
- In this case, the agent tried to place a burner mining drill without having any in inventory, and then correctly proceeded to craft some
